ComicInfo.Title: Somewhere -- Over the Rainbow Bridge!
ComicInfo.Summary: Somewhere -- Over the Rainbow Bridge!: Harris Hobbs asks Thor to take him to Asgard to film a special for his TV network. When Thor refuses, Loki agrees and conceals Hobbs and his crew inside a dangerous adamantium computer that Thor is transporting to Asgard for safe keeping.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:24:59. [Issue ID 32441]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Balder,the Midgard Serpent,Loki,Hogun,Volstagg],Odin (cameo,Harris Hobbs (reporter),Thor,flashback),Joey (sound man),Wilson Travers,The Warriors Three [Fandral,Hymir the Giant,Heimdall,Absorbing Man (cameo,Roger "Red" Norvell (camera man)
